resources.string:
Máximo Liberata Torres (aka MaximoLiberata) is a back-end web developer specializing in APIs and Node.js. 

 He maintains a presence on GitHub where he has: 

Created and contributed to multiple public repositories – examples include react-native-mqtt.js-example, which is a demo of using MQTT.js in React Native; MQTT-Support, a fork of an MQTT client library adapted for React Native; and readable-stream-bigint, an archived project related to node.js stream handling. 

Earned several GitHub achievements: Starstruck, Pull Shark, and Arctic Code Vault Contributor. 

Accumulated at least 6 “stars” on his GitHub profile, indicating recognition by other developers.
